text.text: The only known fix (as stated by the ALREADY_EXISTING_WL event information) is to use the official Synapse UI.

Known fixes taken directly from the official FAQ: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. Uninstall/disable any antivirus that you have installed, alternatively add Synapse (including the custom UI) to their exclusion list. |NEWLINE|2. Download, install and run ProtonVPN, and then run Synapse. |NEWLINE|3. Reinstall Synapse + custom UI completely, delete the entire Synapse Folder and reinstall it from

Known fixes taken directly from the official FAQ: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. Uninstall/disable any antivirus that you have installed, alternatively add Synapse (including the custom UI) to their exclusion list. |NEWLINE|2. Download, install and run ProtonVPN, and then run Synapse. |NEWLINE|3. Reinstall Synapse + custom UI completely, delete the entire Synapse Folder and reinstall it from

This error occures when you use Synapse on more than one device, it can also be triggered by HWID spoofing. |NEWLINE|The solutions are either to: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. Wait the 24 hours. |NEWLINE|2. Contant a Synapse admin and ask them to 'reset your time', they will ask that you provide the hostname of any known PCs, type 'hostname' into CMD to get the hostname for that computer.
The only solution (as stated by the NOT_LOGGED_IN event information) is to login via the offical Synapse UI, as the SXLIB api does not provide authentication methods.

Roblox most likely just launched an update out, patching Synapse in the process, this happens every Wednesday or so. Otherwise, it's just a generic update. |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|The fix for both is to wait for 3dsboy08 to update Synapse.
You are not whitelisted to use Synapse (as stated by the UNAUTHORIZED_HWID event information).
This error is ONLY caused by Synapse, not the custom UI. Try to: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|

bold.text: 1. Add this custom UI and Synapse X to your AV's exclusions list.

text.text: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|If all else fails, wait for an update. 'Unknown' errors are caused by Synapses sxlib.dll, not this custom UI.

An unknown Synapse Custom UI error was thrown, try: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. Restarting this UI. |NEWLINE|2. Disabling your antivirus / adding this exe to it's exclusion list. |NEWLINE|3. Reinstalling both this UI and Synapse.

The detected Synapse installation is invalid, this typically means that the required folders/files are not detected. Make sure: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. You have ran and logged into Synapse alteast once. |NEWLINE|2. You have placed this file in the same folder as your S^X.exe file. |NEWLINE|3. You are running the latest version of Synapse / this custom UI.

The detected CefSharp installation is invalid, make sure: |NEWLINE||NEWLINE|1. You have ran and logged into Synapse alteast once. |NEWLINE|2. You have placed this file in the same folder as your S^X.exe file. |NEWLINE|3. You are running the latest version of Synapse / this custom UI.

An instance of this custom UI is already running |NEWLINE|Close the other one before starting this one.|NEWLINE||NEWLINE|If theres no other visible instance of this UI: |NEWLINE|1. Open up task manager and kill 'SynapseUI (32 bit).'
